usage.cn: 我只是个平凡人，我也有我的小情绪。
usage.eng: I'm just folk. I have mood swings.

usage.cn: 我不是怪异。本人是限量版。
usage.eng: I'm not weird. I'm limited edition.

usage.cn: 每天告诉自己：我真的很不错！
usage.eng: Tell yourself everyday : I am really great.

usage.cn: 我确定这次还是和老板一起。
usage.eng: I'm sure it's with the boss again this time.
